Name: Airline Flight Attendant Simulator VR
About the game: Airline Flight Attendant Simulator VR - is a consumer version of the professional VR training software developed by AVIAR and used by airlines and flight schools to train their future cabin crew members. Your role is an Airline Flight Attendant and your mission is to save the passengers, flight crew, and yourself. You will learn how to prepare the safety equipment before the flight and to respond during extreme conditions when every second matters. Various missions include Rapid and Slow Aircraft Depressurization, Smoke and Fire in different parts of the airplane, Emergency Landing, and Ditching (emergency landing on sea). Total immersion is guaranteed thanks to insanely realistic virtual aircraft and safety equipment, gravity effects, sounds, and intense scenarios.
